dialog: You've just wrapped up your date for the evening.
Where did you go on your date?
You're currently walking your date home.
You catch yourself thinking back on your date.
"What are you so deep in thought about?" you hear from your right.
Snapping back to reality, you look at your date.
"Oh uh, just thinking back on our date."
"Oh I was just thinking about that too!"
"How did you feel about our day today?"
After you finish speaking, you feel a bit awkward as you're not quite sure if she feels the same way.
"Oh I'm so glad you feel the same way! I had a great time!" she says as a big grin spreads across her face.
"Oh, I'm sorry you didn't have a great time. Maybe we can do something else next time." she says.
"Oh . . ." she says, as tears begin to well up in her eyes. "I had a good time today, but I guess you didn't feel the same way."
You continue walking along until you arrive at her place, and say goodnight as she heads inside.
